result.name: survey-of-blue-ling-and-other-deep-water-species-2003-04-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
Data from an FSP trip directed at deep-water fish species to the west of 
Scotland, where some of the stocks are considered to be severely depleted e.g 
orange roughy (*Hoplostethus atlanticus*) in ICES Subarea VI and blue Ling 
(*Molva dypterygia*) in ICES areas Vb,VI, VII.

Station, catch, length (all species) and All catches (retained and discarded) 
were recorded as numbers by species. Length data were recorded for all species 
and maturity data were recorded for blue ling. Otoliths and fin samples of 
blue ling were taken for age determination studies and DNA analysis (for 
future stock structure studies), respectively.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Survey of Blue Ling and Other Deep-Water Species 2003/04 - Fisheries Science Partnership
